title: XBRL UTR electric Charge Item Type units (2024-10-22)
description: Valid units for electricChargeItemType as defined in the XBRL Units Type Registry

anyOf.title: Ampere Hours
anyOf.description: An ampere hour or amp hour is a unit of electric charge, equal to the charge transferred by a steady current of one ampere flowing for one hour

anyOf.title: Coulomb
anyOf.description: The coulomb is the International System of Units (SI) unit of electric charge. It is the charge transported by a constant current of one ampere in one second
